title: Is Mathieu van der Poel’s Dominance making Cyclocross a Snooze-Fest?
content:
Face off: MVDP has won eight from eight this winter, is he taking the stoke out of cyclocross? Velo's editors argue it out.

Read the full article at Is Mathieu van der Poel’s Dominance making Cyclocross a Snooze-Fest? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
